intro.title: Build your contributor profile
intro.description:
We have 3 questions to ask you
in order to match you with the most relevant projects.

technologies.title: What are your favorite technologies?
technologies.description: Rank the ones you most work with, from most to least proficient.

timeAllocation.title: How much time are you willing to allocate to open source projects?
timeAllocation.description: If you're not sure yet, pick your best guess. You can always change it later!

contact.title: What is your Telegram handle?
contact.description: We will only contact you to inform you of potential opportunities for contribution on projects.

telegram.message: A Telegram account is strongly recommended

banner.content: Working at __projectName__ ? You’re 3 clicks away to claim access to your own project on OnlyDust!

panel.title: Claim project
panel.subTitle: First we need to authenticate you as project lead.
panel.content: Please install the OnlyDust Github app on the following organisations.

githubLinkTutorial.title: How to grant permissions
githubLinkTutorial.subTitle: You are required to grant permissions to all organisations where you want to install the OnlyDust Github app.

info.title: What if you can’t grant permissions to all organisations?
info.message: If you encounter an issue while granting permissions, or if you don’t have sufficient access rights (e.g. when you can only request for permissions), please contact us so we can help.

one.title: 1. Open your configuration page on github

bullets.title: Your Github organisations are all listed in this section:
bullets.one: the one(s) on which permissions are already granted (Organisation 1)
bullets.two: the one(s) you need to send a request to organisation owner (Organisation 2)
bullets.three: the one(s) you can grant yourself (Organisation 3)

three.title: 3. GRANT PERMISSIONS to ONLYDUST
three.subTitle: And you’re good to go, you can now install the OnlyDust Github app.
three.informations: Note you may have to re-authenticate to Github to perform this action.

private.tooltip: Private project · only visible to you
private.name: Private

hideContributor.error: The contributor could not be hidden

showContributor.error: The contributor could not be shown

overview.title: Overview
overview.emptyStateDescription: This project has no additional information to showcase for now.

insights.title: Insights

newcomers.sectionSubtitle: All contributors that have joined one of your repositories during last month.

mostActives.sectionSubtitle: User that we indentified as your best profiles and that would match a maintainer role.

staled.sectionSubtitle: User that might encounter a problem on their current task based on their latest actions.

churned.sectionSubtitle: User that are inactive for a long time period and stop contributing to your project.

submit.error: An error occurred, please try again later.

startPopOver.title: Resume project creation?

intro.title: Kickstart your open source journey
intro.description: Want your project to join the stellar OnlyDust galaxy? How exciting! We just need you to review permission details to get started.
intro.disclaimer: We need your permission to connect with your github repositories

name.label: Project name

long.label: Long description
long.placeholder: Within the OnlyDust galaxy, you're the stardust that shapes the future. Contribute to innovative projects, refine your skills and create a lasting impact in the developer community. The stars are within your reach.

name.label: Project name

tooltips.fastPaced: These project have a rapid development speed. Time to merged PRs and Fast Code Review are their main metrics.
